meta.description: Lumi is an open-source desktop app that allows you to create, edit, view and share interactive content with dozens of different content types.
meta.keywords: create, share, interactive content, interactive exercises, h5p, e-learning, elearning, scorm, xapi, authoring tool, offline, standalone, html5

support.description: Even a free and open source product isn't free to make. Lumi is developed, maintained and supported by two teachers in their free time with the goal to make digital education more accessible, individual and exciting for everyone. You can help us improve Lumi by donating or sponsoring.
support.whatWeDoIntro: Due to the increasing number of users and services we need to handle support and feature requests our costs are incresing too.
support.whatWeDoHeader: What your donation helps us to do

bugFixes.description: Fixing bugs and improving the quality of the app by hosting telemetry and debugging systems.

hosting.description: Spread Lumi by hosting the homepage and using Search Engine Optimization tools.

security.description: Make installations easy and secure through buying digital certificates to sign the installers for macOS and Windows.

translation.description: Translate future releases into many languages with machine translation services.

features.description: Develop and introduce new features and functionality.

tools.description: We also develop the H5P Nodejs Library, which is used by various companies and institutions.

home.welcome: Lumi is a desktop app that allows you to create, edit, view and share interactive content with dozens of different content types. It's free and open source.

newsletter.placeholder: enter your email address to receive our newsletter

features.heading: Create, edit and view H5P files directly on your computer.

h5p.heading: All H5P Hub Content Types
h5p.description: You can choose from over 40 content types and directly download them from the H5P Hub.

use.heading: Easy to use
use.description: You don't need any programming knowledge to create engaging interactive content with Lumi!

preview.heading: Quick preview
preview.description: Check your changes without saving by switching to the preview.

standalone.heading: Runs standalone
standalone.description: Lumi runs as a desktop program on your computer. No need for a LMS like Moodle or a CMS like WordPress.

htmlExport.heading: Pure HTML export
htmlExport.description: Save your content as all-in-one HTML files that work nearly everywhere and send it to your learners.

scormExport.heading: SCORM export
scormExport.description: Export your content as SCORM 1.2 packages that can be used in any compliant LMS.

analytics.heading: Get learner progress
analytics.description: Learners can download their progress with Lumi's reporter tool and send it to you for analysis.

openSource.heading: Free and Open Source
openSource.description: Lumi is licensed under the GNU Affero General Public License 3.0 and completely free. You can use content created with it in any way you like.

download.title: Download Lumi
download.linux_format: Download Lumi in your preferred package type:
download.bypass_smartscreen: Learn here how to bypass Windows's SmartScreen filter (only needed for exe-installer).

footer.mission: Make learning accessible, individual and exciting.
footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest news from Lumi.

appPrivacyPolicy.title: Lumi H5P Desktop Editor – Privacy Policy
appPrivacyPolicy.definitions:
To help you understand our privacy policy it was automatically translated from the English original, which is the legally binding document. If you don't understand parts of this document, contact us as described below.

The Lumi H5P Desktop Editor is an application developed and distributed by “Lumi Education GbR Jan Philip Schellenberg und Sebastian Rettig” (“Lumi Education GbR”, “we” and “our company” in the following). This privacy policy will explain how our company uses the personal data we collect from you while you use the app.
appPrivacyPolicy.scope:
This privacy policy only applies to copies of the app you received directly from Lumi Education GbR, either by downloading it from the website lumi.education, the GitHub repository at https://github.com/lumieducation/lumi or from an application store. If you downloaded it from an application store, this privacy policy only applies if you downloaded it from an official store entry of Lumi Education GbR, which can have one of these publishers (or an abbreviation of these):
  • Lumi Education GbR Jan Philip Schellenberg and Sebastian Rettig
  • Jan Philip Schellenberg
  • Sebastian Rettig
appPrivacyPolicy.warningGPL: As the Lumi app is licensed under the AGPL-3.0 License, anyone can change and distribute the app. This privacy policy does not apply to versions of the Lumi app that were modified and published by anyone else.
appPrivacyPolicy.controllerHeading: Who is responsible for data collection in Lumi H5P Desktop Editor?
appPrivacyPolicy.controllerText: The controller (according to Art. 4 (7) GDPR the legal person who determines the purpose and means of the processing of personal data) is Lumi Education GbR Jan Philip Schellenberg and Sebastian Rettig, Frida-Kahlo-Straße 41, D-38126 Braunschweig, Germany.
appPrivacyPolicy.dataHeading: What data is collected? How is it collected?
appPrivacyPolicy.dataText: The following data is transmitted to our organization or third parties while you use the app:

dataTable.row1: 1A unique identifier of your installation and your IP addressWhen you start the appLumi Education GbR
dataTable.row2: 2How often you use the appWhen you start the app & have use statistics enabled
dataTable.row3: 3Information about your computer (operating system) and your locationWhen you start the app & have use statistics enabled
dataTable.row4: 4What parts of the app you useWhile you use the app & have use statistics enabled
dataTable.row5: 5Errors that occur while you use the appIf your app encounters an error & you have bug reporting enabled
dataTable.row6: 6Your IP address, a (stable) unique identifier of your machine and information about the installation of Lumi H5P Editor (version etc.)When downloading content types from the H5P Hub (on app startup and when you click on install or update in the content type list)Joubel AS, c/o Flow Coworking AS Strandgata 9, 9008 Tromsø, Norway (see their privacy policy here: https://h5p.org/privacy)
dataTable.row7: 7Your IP addressWhen checking for new app updates and downloading themGitHub Inc., 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St, San Francisco, CA 94107, United States (see their privacy policy here: https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/github/site-policy/github-privacy-statement)
dataTable.row8: 8Your IP addressWhen using the app (to download fonts)Google, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland (see their privacy policy here: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en)
dataTable.row9: 9Your IP address and possibly other dataIf you use content types that transmit data to third parties (e.g. Speak the Answer transmits your voice recording to Google to transcribe it)depends on content type used
dataTable.row10: 10Your uploaded H5PIf you choose to upload a H5P to Lumi.run via the Lumi Run App Lumi Education GbR

appPrivacyPolicy.basisHeading: On what basis do we collect your data?
appPrivacyPolicy.basisText: We collect or transmit your data with your explicit consent (Art. 6 (1) a GDPR) for numbers 1-9 through the consent dialog on the first start of Lumi. The data transmission in numbers 6-9 is required for the H5P editor and player to work. If you object to it, it is not technically possible to use the app. Data according to number 10 is collected with your explicit consent given before using Lumi Run.
appPrivacyPolicy.usageHeading: How will we use your data?
appPrivacyPolicy.usageText:
Our company collects your data (numbers 1-5) so that we can:
  • decide what parts of the app should be developed further (e.g. choice of languages to localize)
  • to optimize the user interface
  • find and fix bugs
  • contact you with follow-up questions about a bug reported by you
Your data is not used for individual decision-making, including profiling.

Data that we receive about you is not shared with other companies or organizations, except if we are required to do so by law (e.g. for law enforcement) and for processing purposes (see below). It is beyond our control how data that is transmitted directly to third parties (numbers 6-9) is used by them.
appPrivacyPolicy.storageHeading: How do we store your data?

storageText.sentence1: Our company uses a data processor to securely store the data about your app usage (numbers 1-5 and 10) on systems run by Hetzner Online GmbH, Industriestr. 25 , D-91710 Gunzenhausen, Germany.
storageText.sentence2: Our company will keep your data for two years after it was collected. Once this time period has expired, we will delete your data.
storageText.sentence3: It is beyond our control how data that is transmitted directly to third parties (numbers 6-9) is stored by them and for how long. As some of the recipients are resident in the USA, it is likely that your data is transmitted to and stored in the USA.

appPrivacyPolicy.rightsHeading: What are your data protection rights?
appPrivacyPolicy.rightsText: Our company would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:

rightsList.r1: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our company’s processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
rightsList.r2: The right to access – You have the right to request our company for copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
rightsList.r3: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that our company correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request our company to complete the information you believe is incomplete.
rightsList.r4: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that our company erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
rightsList.r5: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that our company restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
rightsList.r6: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that our company transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

appPrivacyPolicy.rightsContact:
If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at our email: c@Lumi.education

All requests concerning data transmitted as described in numbers 6-9 must be directed directly to the recipients.
appPrivacyPolicy.otherSitesText: Our app contains links to other websites. Our privacy policy applies only to our website, so if you click on a link to another website, you should read their privacy policy.
appPrivacyPolicy.changesText: Our company keeps its privacy policy under regular review and places any updates on this web page. This privacy policy was last updated on 10th July 2021.
appPrivacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about our company’s privacy policy, the data we hold on you, or you would like to exercise one of your data protection rights, please do not hesitate to contact us. Email us at: c@Lumi.education
appPrivacyPolicy.authorityHeading: How to contact the appropriate authority
appPrivacyPolicy.authorityText:
Should you wish to report a complaint or if you feel that our company has not addressed your concern in a satisfactory manner, you may contact the Information Commissioner’s Office.

Email: poststelle@lfd.niedersachsen.de
Address:
Der Landesbeauftragte für den Datenschutz Niedersachsen
Prinzenstraße 5
D-30159 Hannover
Germany

disclaimer.languageDisclaimerPrivacyPolicy: The text in this language is for information only. The official, binding version of the privacy policy was written in English.
disclaimer.languageDisclaimerTermsAndConditions: The text in this language is for information only. The official, binding version of the terms and conditions was written in English.
